content:
Oy vey. The U.S. administration has conceded to the wack-a-mole response scenario. Not surprising, all things considered. They're recommending temperature checking, contact tracing, sentinel surveillance, surge ICU capacity planning, and surge PPE and medical equipment planning.

(What a surreal document. It obviously has both Fauci and Trump's input written all over it.)

https://assets.documentcloud.org/documents/6840739/Guidelines-PDF.pdf
